module.name: Voicemail Report
module.description: Displays various information related to the voicemail system.
module.changelog: 2.11.0.9 Fix wording on view FREEPBX-8327 2.11.0.8 Tag the Repo Correctly 2.11.0.7 Fix issue with max_execution_time when system has a lot of voicemails 2.11.0.5 FREEPBX-6101 String to Int PHP Conversion errors 2.11.0.4 Fix text stating save was possible 2.11.0.3 Fix issue where play wouldn't work after sorting columns 2.11.0.2 fix missing image 2.11.0.1 Bump for 2.11 2.10.0.6 Packaging of ver 2.10.0.6
